title: 1. PIA Sale Will Be Completed by 1st October: Privatization Commission Secretary
author: By ProPK Staff
content: The privatization of Pakistan International Airlines (PIA) will be completed by 1st October   2024, Secretary Privatization Commission told the Senate Standing Committee on Privatization on Thursday.
While briefing the committee, the secretary said Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif has instructed that the process be completed by the set deadline without further delays.
Committee chairman Senator Muhammad Tallal Badar expressed optimism that PIAs sale will be completed within the given timeline.
At the same time, he warned against prioritizing political interests over national welfare.

title: 2. Azhar Mahmood Admits Shaheen Afridi is Not Performing at His Best
author: By Sports Desk
content: Pakistan’s assistant coach, Azhar Mahmood, has acknowledged that star pacer Shaheen Afridi is not at his best in the ongoing Test match against Bangladesh.

During the post-day three press conference, responding to a question from ProSports cricket correspondent Behram Qazi, Azhar candidly discussed Shaheen’s form and the challenges he’s currently facing.

Azhar Mahmood admitted that Shaheen, widely regarded as Pakistan’s best fast bowler, has been “off the mark” throughout the match. He pointed out that Shaheen’s usual rhythm and threatening presence on the field seem to be missing, which has been a cause for concern for the team management.
